Edges-Cleric -- Male Human Seasoned Cleric (Cold Domain)
Attributes (8 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d4 Spirit: d8 Strength: d4 Vigor: d12
Skills (12 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d4 Occult: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4 Survival: (sma) d4
Faith: (spi) d10 Psionics: (sma) d4 Weird Science: (sma) d4
Fighting: (agi) d4 Repair: (sma) d4
Notice: (sma) d4 Research: (sma) d4
Skill Notes:
Amorous: -2 on Tests by a foe w/the Attractive feature
Holy Symbol: May reroll Faith when holding holy symbol
Size: 0
Advances: 4 Improvement Points: 12 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 6; Edge: 6
Features
Edges (4 points): Arcane Background (Cleric (Cold Domain)); Destroy Undead; Holy/Unholy Warrior; Mercy Hindrances: Amorous; Shamed; Vengeful+ Human Abilities: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Background (Cleric): Has Holy Symbol, Miracles, and Vow+ features
Miracles: May take edges particular to Arcane Background (Miracles)
Shamed: Past event causes self-doubt
Vengeful+: Seeks revenge by any means
Vow+: Has strict restrictions on behavior and decisions
Combat
Parry: 4 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 9 (1) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Cloak With Hood Shield: None Weapons: Bolas (d4+d4 R3"); Shuriken (d4+d4 R3"); Unarmed (d4+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +2 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Arcana
Power Count: 5 Power Points: 10
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Cleric): 5 Powers/10 Power Points
Destroy Undead: May spend 1 PP to inflict 2d6 damage (or 2 PP for 3d6) on all undead in a 3" radius
Holy/Unholy Warrior: May spend 1-4 Power Points to add an equal amount to a Soak roll
Mercy: R8" May spend 1 PP to remove Distracted, Vulnerable, or Shaken from target
